pullRequest.title: [JENKINS-59601] Add support for JUnit.
pullRequest.bodyText: Added support for JUnit and changed the pom.xml to integrate it with analysis-model 8.0.0-beta5.

commit.message:
Merge pull request #1 from jenkinsci/master

Updating fork

Merge pull request #2 from jenkinsci/master

Updating with new commits
Adding additional test files for JUnit

nodes.bodyText: These files are new and should not be deleted (they came in since you merged with master).
These files are new and should not be deleted (they came in since you merged with master).
Since junit is already used for the test results (junit plugin) we need to use a different name here: what about junitParser.
Overwrite getUrl with link to JUnit.
Can you check if we can include the JUnit 5 logo as well? It would be niche to have the reports linked with the official new logo https://junit.org/junit5/.
